column4: an 130mm artillery shell exploded near Prum Market
column5: Pailin province.------A local villager was cleaning up rubbish and made a bonfire
column6: unaware that the 130mm artillery shell was hidden underground.------The explosion caused fragments to fly around 400m from the site a large piece of shrapnel went through the roof of a guesthouse and landed in a bedroom.------It was very fortunate that nobody was injured in the incident.
